title: Seeking a room to rent semi regularly
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hi

I am looking for a room to rent for my partner and I to use for sexual meets.

Need someone open minded and genuine who wants to make a little money and does not mind renting out part of their home for an afternoon/evening a couple of times a month. We would book in advance and I am a genuine, discreet and sane guy. I just cannot host and I am not comfortable with hotels right now.

In an ideal world you would be a kink friendly woman but the room and flexibility are more important.

The place would be treated with the upmost respect and a fair price paid. Happy to video chat/meet before renting.
